title: Mayonaka no Occult Koumuin (Midnight Occult Civil Servants)
synopsis: The Nocturnal Community Relations Division is a team of people who specialize in solving cases involving the ominous occult creatures of the night unseen by ordinary humans. Young and unsuspecting Arata Miyako has been assigned to the Shinjuku Ward Office of the division, where he meets his fellow members Theo Himezuka and Kyouichi Sakaki.
related_anime: ['Mayonaka no Occult Koumuin: Hitoribocchi no Kyuuketsuki', 'Mayonaka no Occult Koumuin', 'Mayonaka no Occult Koumuin: Fukurokouji to Ano Ko to Ore to']
